file_content.text: Status update, refinery drive alpha. Emergency shut-down successful.
Warning: safety systems remain compromised. Threat of overload is now extreme. Complete emergency shutdown procedures for all refinery drives to avoid failure.
Warning: safety systems compromised. Threat of system overload--high.
Evacuation protocols for all personnel are now mandatory.
Status update, emergency shut-down procedures successful. Threat of overload suspended.
Warning: refinery drives nearing failure. Threat of overload--critical.
